column1: Table 7: Depressive symptoms1 of adults by household type
Great Britain, 27 January to 7 March 2021 and 21 July to 15 August 2021
Source: Opinions and Lifestyle Survey (COVID-19 module), 2021

1. The depression score is derived using the eight-item Patient Health Questionnaire (PHQ-8) screener. For more information, see the Notes tab. Respondents without a valid depression score have been excluded from the analysis.
2. Percentages may not add exactly to 100% due to rounding.
